column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ hazaj

column3: mā āinfa‘nī fī ṭrīq al-msār bālhwá tlḥāḥ
man sayf māḍī ībrī al-ā‘ḍā ḥukmuh saffāḥ

column2: aḥabbāy antum aḥasun al-dahr am ussan
column3: fakūwinūā kamā shi’tum anā dhalik al-khull

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. qaṣīdah. basīṭ
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ mujtathth
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥun li’abī mudīn al-ghawth
